pageContext.claim: “And I heard that they were trying or people were trying to hack into the RNC, too, the Republican National Committee, but we had much better defenses. I have been told that by a number of people. We had much better defenses, so they couldn't.”
pageContext.analysis: Russian operatives did hack state level Republican organizations and some Republican operatives. They did successfully access RNC email domains that were no longer in use but did not successfully access either the RNC or the Trump campaign. However, they did not disseminate any of the information they collected and the intelligence community has said that Russia's efforts were designed to help not hurt the Trump campaign.
